(Just some advice TBW, don't do everything in one post, like the one 
you just did)

Dark One:




Dark One laughed, rolling int he air, a few shots digging into his 
more heavily armored areas, as he planned.  These Maximals were 
persistent, and stupid.  He turned his attack angle, opening fire 
with a missile at Rebelyell.
